CreateBranch.name: CreateBranch
CreateBranch.documentation: Creates a new Branch for an Amplify App.

CreateDeployment.name: CreateDeployment
CreateDeployment.documentation: Create a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

CreateDomainAssociation.name: CreateDomainAssociation
CreateDomainAssociation.documentation: Create a new DomainAssociation on an App

CreateWebhook.name: CreateWebhook
CreateWebhook.documentation: Create a new webhook on an App.

DeleteApp.name: DeleteApp
DeleteApp.documentation: Delete an existing Amplify App by appId.

DeleteBranch.name: DeleteBranch
DeleteBranch.documentation: Deletes a branch for an Amplify App.

DeleteJob.name: DeleteJob
DeleteJob.documentation: Delete a job, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

GenerateAccessLogs.name: GenerateAccessLogs
GenerateAccessLogs.documentation: Retrieve website access logs for a specific time range via a pre-signed URL. Optionally, deliver the logs to a given S3 bucket.

GetApp.name: GetApp
GetApp.documentation: Retrieves an existing Amplify App by appId.

GetArtifactUrl.name: GetArtifactUrl
GetArtifactUrl.documentation: Retrieves artifact info that corresponds to a artifactId.

GetBranch.name: GetBranch
GetBranch.documentation: Retrieves a branch for an Amplify App.

GetDomainAssociation.name: GetDomainAssociation
GetDomainAssociation.documentation: Retrieves domain info that corresponds to an appId and domainName.

GetJob.name: GetJob
GetJob.documentation: Get a job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

GetWebhook.name: GetWebhook
GetWebhook.documentation: Retrieves webhook info that corresponds to a webhookId.

ListArtifacts.name: ListArtifacts
ListArtifacts.documentation: List artifacts with an app, a branch, a job and an artifact type.

ListBranches.name: ListBranches
ListBranches.documentation: Lists branches for an Amplify App.

ListJobs.name: ListJobs
ListJobs.documentation: List Jobs for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

StartDeployment.name: StartDeployment
StartDeployment.documentation: Start a deployment for manual deploy apps. (Apps are not connected to repository)

StartJob.name: StartJob
StartJob.documentation: Starts a new job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

StopJob.name: StopJob
StopJob.documentation: Stop a job that is in progress, for an Amplify branch, part of Amplify App.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.documentation: Tag resource with tag key and value.

UpdateBranch.name: UpdateBranch
UpdateBranch.documentation: Updates a branch for an Amplify App.

UpdateDomainAssociation.name: UpdateDomainAssociation
UpdateDomainAssociation.documentation: Create a new DomainAssociation on an App

appId.documentation: Unique Id for the Amplify App.

createTime.documentation: Create date / time for the Amplify App.

updateTime.documentation: Update date / time for the Amplify App.

iamServiceRoleArn.documentation: IAM service role ARN for the Amplify App.

environmentVariables.documentation: Environment Variables for the Amplify App.

defaultDomain.documentation: Default domain for the Amplify App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.documentation: Enables auto-building of branches for the Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.documentation: Enables Basic Authorization for branches for the Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Basic Authorization credentials for branches for the Amplify App.

customRules.documentation: Custom redirect / rewrite rules for the Amplify App.

enableAutoBranchCreation.documentation: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationPatterns.documentation: Automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationConfig.documentation: Automated branch creation config for the Amplify App.

App.documentation: Amplify App represents different branches of a repository for building, deploying, and hosting.

stage.documentation: Stage for the auto created branch.

framework.documentation: Framework for the auto created branch.

enableAutoBuild.documentation: Enables auto building for the auto created branch.

environmentVariables.documentation: Environment Variables for the auto created branch.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Basic Authorization credentials for the auto created branch.

enableBasicAuth.documentation: Enables Basic Auth for the auto created branch.

buildSpec.documentation: BuildSpec for the auto created branch.

enablePullRequestPreview.documentation: Enables Pull Request Preview for auto created branch.

AutoBranchCreationConfig.documentation: Structure with auto branch creation config.

BadRequestException.documentation: Exception thrown when a request contains unexpected data.

branchArn.documentation: ARN for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

description.documentation: Description for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

tags.documentation: Tag for branch for Amplify App.

stage.documentation: Stage for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

displayName.documentation: Display name for a branch, will use as the default domain prefix.

enableNotification.documentation: Enables notifications for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

createTime.documentation: Creation date and time for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

updateTime.documentation: Last updated date and time for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

environmentVariables.documentation: Environment Variables specific to a branch, part of an Amplify App.

enableAutoBuild.documentation: Enables auto-building on push for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

customDomains.documentation: Custom domains for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

framework.documentation: Framework for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

activeJobId.documentation: Id of the active job for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

totalNumberOfJobs.documentation: Total number of Jobs part of an Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.documentation: Enables Basic Authorization for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Basic Authorization credentials for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

buildSpec.documentation: BuildSpec content for branch for Amplify App.

ttl.documentation: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

associatedResources.documentation: List of custom resources that are linked to this branch.

enablePullRequestPreview.documentation: Enables Pull Request Preview for this branch.

destinationBranch.documentation: The destination branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

sourceBranch.documentation: The source branch if the branch is a pull request branch.

Branch.documentation: Branch for an Amplify App, which maps to a 3rd party repository branch.

BuildSpec.documentation: BuildSpec file for Amplify app build.

platform.documentation: Platform / framework for an Amplify App

iamServiceRoleArn.documentation: AWS IAM service role for an Amplify App

oauthToken.documentation: OAuth token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. OAuth token is not stored.

accessToken.documentation: Personal Access token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. Token is not stored.

environmentVariables.documentation: Environment variables map for an Amplify App.

enableBranchAutoBuild.documentation: Enable the auto building of branches for an Amplify App.

enableBasicAuth.documentation: Enable Basic Authorization for an Amplify App, this will apply to all branches part of this App.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Credentials for Basic Authorization for an Amplify App.

customRules.documentation: Custom rewrite / redirect rules for an Amplify App.

enableAutoBranchCreation.documentation: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationPatterns.documentation: Automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationConfig.documentation: Automated branch creation config for the Amplify App.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

enableAutoBuild.documentation: Enables auto building for the branch.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Basic Authorization credentials for the branch.

enableBasicAuth.documentation: Enables Basic Auth for the branch.

ttl.documentation: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

displayName.documentation: Display name for a branch, will use as the default domain prefix.

enablePullRequestPreview.documentation: Enables Pull Request Preview for this branch.

branch.documentation: Branch structure for an Amplify App.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for the branch, for the Job.

fileMap.documentation: Optional file map that contains file name as the key and file content md5 hash as the value. If this argument is provided, the service will generate different upload url per file. Otherwise, the service will only generate a single upload url for the zipped files.

CreateDeploymentRequest.documentation: Request structure for create a new deployment.

jobId.documentation: The jobId for this deployment, will supply to start deployment api.

fileUploadUrls.documentation: When the fileMap argument is provided in the request, the fileUploadUrls will contain a map of file names to upload url.

zipUploadUrl.documentation: When the fileMap argument is NOT provided. This zipUploadUrl will be returned.

CreateDeploymentResult.documentation: Result structure for create a new deployment.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

domainName.documentation: Domain name for the Domain Association.

enableAutoSubDomain.documentation: Enables automated creation of Subdomains for branches.

source.documentation: The source pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

target.documentation: The target pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

status.documentation: The status code for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

condition.documentation: The condition for a URL rewrite or redirect rule, e.g. country code.

statusReason.documentation: Reason for the current status of the Domain Association.

startTime.documentation: The time at which the logs should start, inclusive.

endTime.documentation: The time at which the logs should end, inclusive.

InternalFailureException.documentation: Exception thrown when the service fails to perform an operation due to an internal issue.

summary.documentation: Summary for an execution job for an Amplify App.

steps.documentation: Execution steps for an execution job, for an Amplify App.

Job.documentation: Structure for an execution job for an Amplify App.

commitId.documentation: Commit Id from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitMessage.documentation: Commit message from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitTime.documentation: Commit date / time for the Job.

startTime.documentation: Start date / time for the Job.

endTime.documentation: End date / time for the Job.

jobType.documentation: Type for the Job. \n "RELEASE": Manually released from source by using StartJob API. "RETRY": Manually retried by using StartJob API. "WEB_HOOK": Automatically triggered by WebHooks.

JobSummary.documentation: Structure for the summary of a Job.

LimitExceededException.documentation: Exception thrown when a resource could not be created because of service limits.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token. If non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in another request to fetch more entries.

maxResults.documentation: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.

ListAppsRequest.documentation: Request structure for an Amplify App list request.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token. Set to null to start listing Apps from start. If non-null pagination token is returned in a result, then pass its value in here to list more projects.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for a branch, part of an Amplify App.

maxResults.documentation: Maximum number of records to list in a single response.

jobSummaries.documentation: Result structure for list job result request.

NotFoundException.documentation: Exception thrown when an entity has not been found during an operation.

lastDeployTime.documentation: Last Deploy Time of Production Branch.

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: Exception thrown when an operation fails due to non-existent resource.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for the branch, for the Job.

jobId.documentation: The job id for this deployment, generated by create deployment request.

sourceUrl.documentation: The sourceUrl for this deployment, used when calling start deployment without create deployment. SourceUrl can be any HTTP GET url that is public accessible and downloads a single zip.

StartDeploymentRequest.documentation: Request structure for start a deployment.

StartDeploymentResult.documentation: Result structure for start a deployment.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for the branch, for the Job.

jobId.documentation: Unique Id for an existing job. Required for "RETRY" JobType.

jobType.documentation: Type for the Job. Available JobTypes are: \n "RELEASE": Start a new job with the latest change from the specified branch. Only available for apps that have connected to a repository. "RETRY": Retry an existing job. JobId is required for this type of job.

jobReason.documentation: Descriptive reason for starting this job.

commitId.documentation: Commit Id from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitMessage.documentation: Commit message from 3rd party repository provider for the Job.

commitTime.documentation: Commit date / time for the Job.

StartJobRequest.documentation: Request structure for Start job request.

StartJobResult.documentation: Result structure for run job request.

startTime.documentation: Start date/ time of the execution step.

endTime.documentation: End date/ time of the execution step.

logUrl.documentation: URL to the logs for the execution step.

artifactsUrl.documentation: URL to the artifact for the execution step.

testArtifactsUrl.documentation: URL to the test artifact for the execution step.

testConfigUrl.documentation: URL to the test config for the execution step.

screenshots.documentation: List of screenshot URLs for the execution step, if relevant.

statusReason.documentation: The reason for current step status.

context.documentation: The context for current step, will include build image if step is build.

Step.documentation: Structure for an execution step for an execution job, for an Amplify App.

appId.documentation: Unique Id for an Amplify App.

branchName.documentation: Name for the branch, for the Job.

StopJobRequest.documentation: Request structure for stop job request.

StopJobResult.documentation: Result structure for the stop job request.

branchName.documentation: Branch name setting for the Subdomain.

TTL.documentation: The content TTL for the website in seconds.

resourceArn.documentation: Resource arn used to tag resource.

TagResourceRequest.documentation: Request structure used to tag resource.

UnauthorizedException.documentation: Exception thrown when an operation fails due to a lack of access.

resourceArn.documentation: Resource arn used to untag resource.

tagKeys.documentation: Tag keys used to untag resource.

UntagResourceRequest.documentation: Request structure used to untag resource.

environmentVariables.documentation: Environment Variables for an Amplify App.

basicAuthCredentials.documentation: Basic Authorization credentials for an Amplify App.

customRules.documentation: Custom redirect / rewrite rules for an Amplify App.

enableAutoBranchCreation.documentation: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationPatterns.documentation: Automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify App.

autoBranchCreationConfig.documentation: Automated branch creation branchConfig for the Amplify App.

accessToken.documentation: Personal Access token for 3rd party source control system for an Amplify App, used to create webhook and read-only deploy key. Token is not stored.

documentation: Amplify is a fully managed continuous deployment and hosting service for modern web apps.
